entities.description: A type of aggravated assault or homicide circumstance involving a verbal or physical altercation.
An incident where an assault is directed towards law enforcement officers.
An aggravated assault or homicide circumstance related to the sale or distribution of illegal drugs.
Criminal activities involving gang members, including violent acts.
Violent acts or criminal activities involving gang members who are juveniles.
An incident involving a conflict, often violent, between domestic partners or family members.
An act of killing performed to alleviate some form of suffering.
An aggravated assault or homicide circumstance involving other felonious activities.
Other varied circumstances under which aggravated assaults or homicides occur.
Criminal incidents where a private citizen is the victim or perpetrator.
Criminal incidents where a law officer is involved either as victim or perpetrator.
Incidents involving children irresponsibly handling a weapon.
An accident occurring while cleaning a firearm.
Accidental incidents occurring in the context of hunting.
Incidents caused by careless handling of weapons.
Incidents involving negligent actions resulting in killing.
Circumstances of aggravate assault or homicide that are unknown or missing.

relationships.description: Classifies assault on law enforcement as a subtype of violent crime.
Classifies drug dealing as a subtype of crime.
Links gang activities to involvement by gang members.
Classifies domestic violence as a subtype of violent conflict.
Indicates that mercy killing is an outcome intended to alleviate suffering.
Classifies negligent weapon handling as a subtype of negligence.
Indicates that a child playing with a weapon is a circumstance leading to injury or death.
Relates unknown circumstances to cases of unsolved crime.
